decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | Details of facilities for refuse storage shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  Such provision shall be brought into use prior to the  initial occupation of either of the flats hereby permitted and retained permanently.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.11, 5.1, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, 5.6, 5.9, 9.1 and 9.8 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | All new and disturbed external surfaces, including bricked up doors and windows, shall be made good in materials to match those of the existing building.  REASON:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | No part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Use of first and second floor as two flats
